languages.text: "Воистину. Ты призвал нас биться за тебя с ксеносами, и мы пролили немало нелюдской крови. Но ветер битвы занес меня далеко, и я утратил связь со своей стаей. Известно ли тебе, где охотятся мои братья, Зловещий вой?"

"Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"
languages.original_text: "Воистину. Ты призвал нас биться за тебя с ксеносами, и мы пролили немало нелюдской крови. Но ветер битвы занес меня далеко, и я утратил связь со своей стаей. Известно ли тебе, где охотятся мои братья, Зловещий вой?"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You summoned us to fight xenos for you, and we spilt a lot of inhuman blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I've lost touch with my pack. Do you know where I can find my brothers, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You summoned us to fight xenos for you, and we spilt a lot of inhuman blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I've lost touch with my pack. Do you know where I can find my brothers, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You summoned us to fight the xenos for you, and we spilt a lot of inhuman blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I've lost touch with my pack. Do you know where can I find my brothers, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You summoned us to fight the xenos for you, and we spilt a lot of inhuman blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I've lost touch with my pack. Do you know where can I find my brothers, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You summoned us to fight the xenos for you, and we spilt a lot of inhuman blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost touch with my pack. Do you know where I can find my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “没错，你召唤我们来帮你对抗异形，我们也让它们流了很多血，但战斗之风把我们吹得太远了，我与我的狼群失去了联系。你知道该去哪里找到我的兄弟们，怒嚎者狼群吗？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: “没错，你召唤我们来帮你对抗异形，我们也让它们流了很多血，但战斗之风把我们吹得太远了，我与我的狼群失去了联系。你知道该去哪里找到我的兄弟们，渴名者狼群吗？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「いかにも。お前は異種族と戦うために俺たちに助けを求めた。多くの異種族の血が流れた。そして、戦いの風は俺を遠くへと運び、群れとの繋がりを失ってしまった。俺の兄弟、破滅の咆哮がどこにいるか分かるか？」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: 「いかにも。お前は異種族と戦うために俺たちに助けを求めた。多くの異種族の血が流れた。そして、戦いの風は俺を遠くへと運び、群れとの繋がりを失ってしまった。俺の兄弟、破滅の咆哮がどこにいるか分かるか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «En efecto. Usted solicitó nuestra ayuda para combatir a los xenos. Derramamos ríos de su sangre, pero los vientos de la batalla me llevaron lejos y perdió el contacto con mi jauría. ¿Sabe dónde puedo reencontrarme con mis hermanos del Aullido Torvo?».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: «En efecto. Nos convocó para luchar contra los xenos y derramamos mucha sangre inhumana, pero el viento de la batalla me llevó lejos y he perdido el contacto con mi manada. ¿Sabe dónde puedo encontrar a mis hermanos, los Hambrientos de Fama?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "In der Tat. Ihr habt uns um Hilfe im Kampf gegen Xenos gebeten. Wir haben viel außerirdisches Blut vergossen. Doch der Wind der Schlacht hat mich weit getragen, und ich habe den Kontakt zu meinem Rudel verloren. Wisst Ihr, wo ich meine Brüder finden kann, das Baleful-Howl-Rudel?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Ihr habt uns gerufen, um die Xenos für Euch zu bekämpfen, und wir haben reichlich unmenschliches Blut vergossen. Doch der Wind der Schlacht hat mich weit getragen, und ich habe den Kontakt zu meinem Rudel verloren. Wisst Ihr, wo ich meine Brüder finden kann, die Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « En effet. Vous avez demandé notre aide pour combattre les xénos. Nous avons fait couler quantité de sang non-humain. Mais au cours de la bataille, je me suis égaré et j'ai perdu la trace de ma meute. Savez-vous où je pourrais trouver mes frères, les Hurleurs sanguinaires ? »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Vous avez demandé notre aide pour combattre les xénos. Nous avons fait couler quantité de sang non-humain. Mais au cours de la bataille, je me suis égaré et j'ai perdu la trace de ma meute. Savez-vous où je pourrais trouver mes frères, les Hurleurs sanguinaires ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Zenolarla mücadelenize destek olmamızı istemiştiniz. Çok uzaylı kanı döktük. Ama harp rüzgârları beni uzaklara attı. Sürümden ayrı düştüm. Kardeşlerimin, Uğursuz Uluma'nın yerini nasıl bulabilirim?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed. You petitioned our aid in fighting xenos. We spilt much alien blood. But the wind of battle carried me far, and I lost contact with my pack. Do you know where I can seek out my brothers, the Baleful Howl?"
